overview:
Ed is co-founder of flexjex.com where he is responsible for development and all things technical.

After graduating Ed remained in Cambridge working in the tech-sector; first as Business Manager for Cambridge Flow Solutions, a university spin-out providing bespoke fluid dynamics software with close links to Formula 1, and subsequently as CTO of Cambridge Intellectual Property, a small start-up specializing in innovative patent analytics and business strategy advice.

Ed holds an MA and MEng in Aeronautical Engineering from the University of Cambridge and completed postgraduate studies on ACDMM at the Institute for Manufacture, Cambridge.
